clinical_study.brief_title: Video Images About Decisions for Ethical Outcomes in the Emergency Department (VIDEO-ED)
clinical_study.official_title: Using the Emergency Department Visit to Promote Advance Care Planning

brief_summary.textblock: A randomized controlled trial of a video decision aid in the Emergency Department Setting to improve advance care planning documentation.

detailed_description.textblock: A randomized controlled trial of a video decision aid in the Emergency Department setting shown to patients followed by a brief advance care planning discussion and then relay that discussion to the patient's primary care provider and/or admitting clinical team and look at rates of advance care planning documentation in the electronic health record over time. Primary outcome is advance care planning documentation in the EHR at 3 months.

study_design_info.masking_description: Primary outcome will be obtained through natural language processing (NLP) from the EHR, in which the RA conducting the NLP will not know which arm of the study the patient was in.

primary_outcome.measure: EHR documentation of advance care planning
primary_outcome.description: EHR documentation of advance care planning

secondary_outcome.measure: patient reported conversations with health care providers and family
secondary_outcome.description: patient reported conversations with health care providers and family

secondary_outcome.measure: concordance between stated and documented preferences
secondary_outcome.description: concordance between stated and documented preferences

secondary_outcome.measure: differential intervention effects of the ACP video intervention on patient ACP documentation based on race and ethnicity
secondary_outcome.description: We will look at ACP documentation in the intervention and control arms to see if there are differential intervention effects based on race and ethnicity. We will look at the ACP documentation rate in Whites in both arms, and compare them to African Americans and Latinx populations. We will be able to see if the intervention had a greater or lesser effect on ACP rates in sub groups of our population by race and ethnicity.

secondary_outcome.measure: quality of clinician ACP communication using an ACP quality communication survey
secondary_outcome.time_frame: quality of communication at the time of the survey interview (baseline), and then at 3 and 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: quality of ACP communication using an ACP quality communication survey

secondary_outcome.measure: patient CPR and breathing machine preferences
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at time of survey (baseline) and then after 3 and 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: we will ask the patient whether or not they want CPR attempted and whether they would wish to be placed on a breathing machine

secondary_outcome.measure: patient preferences for goals of care
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at time of survey (baseline) and then after 3 and 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: We will ask patient if they wish to receive life prolonging care, limited care or comfort care.

secondary_outcome.measure: decisional certainty regarding decision making for ACP preferences
secondary_outcome.description: we will ask patients how certain they are about their decisions for the goals of care
We will ask patients knowledge questions about their understanding of advance care planning

secondary_outcome.measure: patient confidence in health care delivery that is aligned with patient preferences
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at time of survey (baseline) and then after 3 and 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: We will ask patients how confident they are in that they will receive the type of medical care they wish in their health care system

secondary_outcome.measure: patient ACP engagement with ACP topics
secondary_outcome.description: We will ask patients how ready and engaged they are with the topic of advance care planning

arm_group.description: Video decision aid and advance care planning discussion
A standardized written form that details advance care planning options.

intervention.description: advance care planning video decision aid

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- anyone aged over 79 or anyone aged over 49 with an indicator of serious illness
Exclusion Criteria:
- non english or spanish speakers those with a POLST legally blind medically non stable requiring ICU level care

patient_data.ipd_time_frame: 1 year after all primary and secondary publications published.
